properties.SQL Query:
ALTER TABLE mycloud.nifi_ingest.pokemon_spawns 
EXECUTE add_files(
    location => 's3://#{s3.bucket}/#{bucket.path.add_files}/${filename}',
    format => 'AVRO')

INSERT INTO mycloud.nifi_ingest.pokemon_spawns
  SELECT * FROM mycloud.nifi_ingest.${uuidnodash}
properties.sql-pre-query:
CREATE TABLE mycloud.nifi_ingest.${uuidnodash} (
    s2_id bigint, s2_token varchar,
    num int, name varchar,
    lat double, lng double,
    encounter_ms bigint, disppear_ms bigint
)
WITH (type = 'hive', format = 'TEXTFILE', textfile_field_separator = ',',
      external_location = 's3://#{s3.bucket}/#{bucket.path.ephemeral_tables}/${uuid}')
